Callout.Info: If you are interested in sharing your expertise in Azure related topics, send us an email to let us know

Sessions.Title: Build and deploy applications using Microsoft Azure
Sessions.Description: In the ever-expanding universe of cloud innovation, developers may find themselves at a hard spot as to the different ways of building apps for the cloud and to making good use of the available tools. How do you design, implement and deploy websites in the cloud? What sort of strategies should you select at each case? How do you scale and monitor your cloud applications? This session aims at providing a comprehensive introduction of Azure, without getting into specifics. Get to know all the basics and how to make good use of them in your work as a developer.

Speaker.Name: Paris Polyzos
Speaker.Description:
Senior Software Engineer @ ZuluTrade
Paris is a Fullstack Engineer, with 10 years of experience in the field. He holds an MSc in Electrical Computer Engineering, while, since the early days of his career, he had the chance to work in large and challenging projects. Nowadays, he is mainly focused on the cloud where he designs and builds complex software for a new company of the ZuluTrade Group. He is particularly passionate about the Web, Microsoft technologies and the cloud; thus, his new-found enthusiasm is Microsoft Azure!

Sessions.Title: Optimize website performance/testing
Sessions.Description: Caching at different levels is a widely common technique for the enhancement of website speed. Together we will explore all relevant possibilities, tools and technologies out there.

Sessions.Title: Build Always-On, Hyper-Scalable Microservice-based Cloud Services
Sessions.Description: Microservices is an approach to application development in which every part of the application is deployed as a fully self-contained component that can be individually scaled and updated. With a good microservice architecture, customers can solve the management, deployment, orchestration, and patching needs of a container-based service, with reduced risk of availability loss while maintaining high agility.

Speaker.Name: Kostas Pantos
Speaker.Description:
Cloud Solutions Architect @ Microsoft Hellas
Since 2001, when I started my professional career, I was given the opportunity to work with some of the largest Greek Software development Companies and worked with cutting edge Microsoft technologies. Nowadays I work as a Solutions Architect for Microsoft where I focus in providing innovative cloud solutions.

Sessions.Title: Azure Elastic SQL Database
Sessions.Description: When should I write a Stored Procedure (SP)? Should I write one for every CRUD operation? When should I create Views? How may I include Business Rules in an SP? How may I avoid duplicate code? These are few of the questions that are going to receive an answer, through an in-depth analysis of Stored Procedures in Azure Elastic SQL Database.

Speaker.Name: Antonios Chatzipavlis
Speaker.Description:
Senior SQL Server DBA at National Bank of Greece
Antonios has been involved with computers since 1982. He started his professional carrier in IT, especially in software development in 1988. In 1998 he started his carrier as Microsoft Certified Trainer in Microsoft development products. He is a moderator of autoexec.gr community

Sessions.Title: Azure Search, Solr, Elastic Search
Sessions.Description: Search as a Service hosted on the cloud, made possible with Azure Search. Azure Search is one of the most complete feature, fully managed professional search mechanisms available on the market. Within a micro-session, examples will be given of how developers and companies can benefit from adding search within their application and also how does Azure ease the addition of search capabilities within applications (web/mobile etc.). Search is more than a simple text search, facets to dynamically categorize search results, fuzzy searches that would deal with situations where users have misspelled words, or text suggestions are all available on Azure Search. Finally a quick comparison on how does Azure Search compete with Lucene based Solr, one of the leading enterprise search platforms.

Speaker.Name: Vasilis Aivalis
Speaker.Description:
Senior Software Engineer @ ZuluTrade
Vasilis holds a BSc. and MSc. in Computer Science since 2003. He has been working as a software developer for Siemens, Atos-Origin and ZuluTrade. Throughout his career Vasilis has been given the opportunity to work with various industries, platforms and programming languages.

Sessions.Title: Web API on the rocks
Sessions.Description: ASP.NET Web API constitutes one of the best frameworks in the field for the creation of http-based services. We will have the chance to learn some tips and tricks, drawn upon the experience of Entersoft in demanding environments and situations.
